title: Wouldn't it make more sense if the first 6 people picking in draft got to ban?
body:
As they are more likely to get counter picked, whenever I'm first pick I have to beg someone on my team to ban *insert champion here* because they counter me. Where as when I'm last pick I'm just like, "well {{champion:67}} annoying I guess I'll just ban her". 

This is just my opinion I could be completely wrong.

replies.body:
No. It would be unfair advantage because you would be able not only to ban, but also to pick first form all the champions that are left. 

The way it is now is kinda all right because you either ban or pick first. 

That ofc would change if we get 10 bans.
